title: Stuck at 60 FPS after 7.9 Patch on MAC
body: My fps have been stable before this patch launch before few days ago i always had it on 140 and up, but now it's stuck on 60 fps doesn't matter if i change the settings to the lowest or highest and it's been few days hopefully right are working on a solution (MacBook Pro (Retina, 15-inch, Mid 2015))

replies.body: Thanks for reporting this!  While in your in-game settings, what is your frame cap set to in your video options?  Do you also have vertical sync enabled?  This could play a part in locking your frame rate, so let me know!
yeah it seems kinda of silly. this is a clear issue on the forms and it has been weeks. riot seems to just go quite and wait it out. please get a fix for your Mac users. ;D like hello?

I'm seeing the same issue (Late 2014 27" iMac, Radeon R290x, OSX Yosemite). FPS capped at 120, no vsync. As you know, this relates to the 7.9 Mac release being broken and you not having either reverted to 7.8 or issued a hotfix yet. This isn't very good customer service, I'm afraid.

(The required-command-tab-to-get-in-game issue is also happening.)
This doesn't even matter though, i doubt your monitor can even display higher than 60
i have it uncapped and i had the vertical sync enabled after disabling it my fps went up to 100-140 thanks for the reply i guess that was the issue{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
